channel.title: Nature on Explore Miño
channel.description: Recent content in Nature on Explore Miño

item.title: Beaches
item.description: The beaches of Miño are undoubtedly one of its main attractions. Framed by the calm estuaries, Galician greenery, and a sun-friendly orientation, Miño becomes an ideal destination to enjoy the Galician summer without crowds or rush.

item.title: Hiking
item.description: Miño is an ideal destination for those who enjoy hiking. Its privileged location between sea and mountains allows you to discover a variety of landscapes, from peaceful beaches to lush forests, including historic routes like the Camino de Santiago.
